targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM V_MFR_ATUAL;
SELECT * FROM V_LDR_ATUAL;

SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN UPPER(TRIM(COALESCE(local, ''))) = 'BEDROOM' AND valor < 20 THEN 'Dormindo'
    ELSE 'Acordado'
  END AS "status"
FROM
  TBL_SENSORES
WHERE
  sensor_id = 202
ORDER BY
  data_hora DESC
LIMIT 1;

WITH transitions AS (
  SELECT
    TRIM(local) as current_local,
    LAG(TRIM(local), 1, '') OVER (ORDER BY data_hora) AS previous_local
  FROM
    TBL_SENSORES
  WHERE
    DATE(data_hora) = CURDATE() AND
    local IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(local) != ''
)
SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS "Trocas de Cômodo"
FROM
  transitions
WHERE
  current_local != previous_local;

WITH last_location AS (
    SELECT
        data_hora,
        local
    FROM TBL_SENSORES
    WHERE
        local IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(local) != ''
    ORDER BY data_hora DESC
    LIMIT 1
),
last_change AS (
    SELECT
        MAX(data_hora) AS last_change_time
    FROM (
        SELECT
            data_hora,
            TRIM(local) as current_local,
            LAG(TRIM(local), 1, '') OVER (ORDER BY data_hora) AS previous_local
        FROM TBL_SENSORES
        WHERE
            data_hora >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND
            local IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(local) != ''
    ) AS transitions
    WHERE
        current_local != previous_local
)
SELECT
    CASE
        
        WHEN lc.last_change_time < NOW() - INTERVAL 2 HOUR AND (HOUR(NOW()) >= 7 AND HOUR(NOW()) < 22) THEN 'Alerta: Inatividade'
        
        -- 3. Se tudo estiver bem
        ELSE 'OK'
    END AS "status_risco"
FROM
    last_location ll,
    last_change lc;
SELECT * FROM V_MQ_ATUAL;
SELECT * FROM V_HRS_ATUAL;
SELECT * FROM V_LM_ATUAL;
SELECT * FROM V_MAX_ATUAL;

SELECT
  local AS "Cômodo",
  COUNT(*) AS "Número de Visitas"
FROM (
  SELECT
    local,
    LAG(local, 1, '') OVER (ORDER BY data_hora) AS local_anterior
  FROM
    TBL_SENSORES
  WHERE
    local IS NOT NULL AND local != '' and local != 'Global'
) AS t
WHERE
  local != local_anterior
GROUP BY
  local
ORDER BY
  "Número de Visitas" DESC;
SELECT chance FROM EC_DATA.TBL_CORRCARDIACA order by data_hora desc LIMIT 1;
SELECT COUNT(situacao), situacao FROM EC_DATA.V_SITUACAO_BPM GROUP BY situacao LIMIT 50

SELECT local, situacao, valor
FROM (
    SELECT 
        local,
        situacao,
        data_hora,
        valor,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY local ORDER BY data_hora DESC) AS rn
    FROM V_TEMPERATURA_POR_COMODO
) t
WHERE rn = 1;

SELECT 
  data_hora as time,
  bpm as BPM,
  temperatura
FROM EC_DATA.V_BPM_CRAWLER
WHERE $__timeFilter(data_hora)
SELECT valor AS "Valor", data_hora AS "Data Hora" FROM EC_DATA.V_MQ7 ORDER BY data_hora ASC LIMIT 50
SELECT valor AS "Valor", data_hora AS "Data Hora" FROM EC_DATA.V_LDR ORDER BY data_hora ASC LIMIT 50
SELECT valor AS "Valor", data_hora AS "Data Hora" FROM EC_DATA.V_LM35 ORDER BY data_hora ASC LIMIT 50
SELECT valor AS "Valor", data_hora AS "Data Hora" FROM EC_DATA.V_HRS3300 LIMIT 50
SELECT valor AS "Valor", data_hora AS "Data hora" FROM EC_DATA.V_SP02 ORDER BY data_hora ASC LIMIT 50

panels.description: A listagem representa todos os alertas registrados pelo sistema de monitoramento.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT momento_alerta as "Data/Hora",
 local_ajustado as "Localização",
 sensor_gerador as "Sensor Responsável",
 valor_alerta as "Valor do Alerta",
 classificacao as "Classificação",
 co as CO, 
 bpm as BPM,
 temperatura as Temperatura,
 spo2
 FROM EC_DATA.TBL_HISTORICO_ALERTAS_FLATTENED ORDER BY momento_alerta DESC;

panels.title: Histórico de Alertas
